mapper.select: SELECT G.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, G.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, G.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, G.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST as amountAuditLast FROM wp_g G where 1 = 1 and G.STATUS = 'Y' and G.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and G.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT G300.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, G300.ATTR1 as detail, G300.DR_AMOUNT_CNY as drAmount, G300.CR_AMOUNT_CNY as crAmount, G300.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance FROM wp_g300 G300 where 1 = 1 and G300.STATUS = 'Y' and G300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and G300.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT G10000.ITEM as item, IF(G10000.BEGIN_BALANCE = 0, null, G10000.BEGIN_BALANCE) as beginBalance, IF(G10000.END_BALANCE = 0, null, G10000.END_BALANCE) as endBalance FROM wp_g10000 G10000 WHERE 1 = 1 and G10000.STATUS = 'Y' and G10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and G10000.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY G10000.SORT

SELECT IF(SUM(G10000.BEGIN_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(G10000.BEGIN_BALANCE)) as beginBalance, IF(SUM(G10000.END_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(G10000.END_BALANCE)) as endBalance FROM wp_g10000 G10000 WHERE 1 = 1 and G10000.STATUS = 'Y' and G10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and G10000.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(IFNULL(G10000.END_BALANCE, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(G10000.BEGIN_BALANCE, 0)) FROM wp_g10000 G10000 WHERE 1 = 1 and G10000.STATUS = 'Y' and G10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and G10000.PERIOD = #{period}
